abilities.description: An island-destroying technique where Enel condenses massive thunderclouds generated by his ark Maxim into an enormous sphere of lightning. When dropped, it creates a devastating explosion capable of completely annihilating entire islands, leaving only massive craters.
A massive lightning column that crashes down on targets from above
As a Logia type, allows the user to create, control, and become lightning at will, providing intangibility to non-Haki attacks

keyMoments.title: Raigo Technique Debuts
keyMoments.description: Enel unleashes the Raigo technique for the first time, condensing thunderclouds into a massive sphere of lightning that he will use to destroy Angel Island.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Raigo as one of the most destructive techniques in the entire series, demonstrating the catastrophic potential when Devil Fruit powers are combined with technology.

keyMoments.title: Raigo Destroys Angel Island
keyMoments.description: The Raigo attack completely obliterates Angel Island, leaving only a massive crater and killing countless inhabitants.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the terrifying destructive capability of the Goro Goro no Mi's ultimate technique and establishes it as a genuine weapon of mass destruction.

weaknesses.description: Rubber acts as a natural insulator against electricity, making rubber-bodied individuals completely immune to all electrical attacks from this fruit.

power.description: Considered one of the most powerful Logia-type Devil Fruits, with the user capable of generating up to 200 million volts. The combination of speed, destructive power, and intangibility makes it nearly unstoppable against opponents without rubber bodies or Haki.

abilities.description: Luffy uses the golden ball attached to his arm to stretch himself far back and then snap forward with tremendous force, propelling himself through the air like a yo-yo.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Yo-Yo Debuts
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts the Gomu Gomu no Yo-Yo technique, using the golden ball that Enel attached to his arm as a tool for propulsion.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Luffy's creativity in turning disadvantages into advantages, transforming what was meant to handicap him into a useful technique.

reveals.information: Gomu Gomu no Yo-Yo - new mobility technique
